alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:19PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Ware and northeastern Charlton Counties through 1245 PM EDT... At 1219 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homeland, or near Folkston, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Homeland, Race Pond and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Charlton; Northern Ware; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
